updates.Title: Initial relese of Atlas
updates.Description: In version 1.0.0 of Atlas, many functions are now available free of charge to anyone who has access to the program.

updates.Title: Updated to latest Fortnite
updates.Description: Atlas is compatible with the latest Fortnite version. The current patch is ++Fortnite+Release-32.00-CL-37770125 (13.11.2024)

updates.Title: Report bugs
updates.Description: If you notice any problems or bugs, please report them to the Atlas developers.
